DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center , non-random , open study , observe efficacy safety bevacizumab plus Oxaliplatin base multidrug chemotherapy conversion therapy patient previously untreated unresectable liver metastasis colorectal cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Bevacizumab Therapy Untreated Unresectable Liver Metastases From Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES：To assess objective response rate ( ORR ) （8 week chemotherapy） SECONDARY OBJECTIVES： 1 . To assess R0 resection rate liver metastases（8 week chemotherapy、every three month follow-up 1 time R0 postoperative 1-2 years、Every six month follow-up 1 time R0 postoperative 2-5 years） 2 . To assess incidence adverse event level 3-4 （Bleeding、Gastrointestinal Perforation、Anastomotic Fistula、Hypertension、Wound Healing Delay）（8 week chemotherapy）
